question: Prithvi Sekhar is associated to which sports?
explanation: Unseeded Prithvi Sekhar from Chennai has clinched the men’s singles title in the 2nd edition of World Deaf Tennis Championships (WDTC-2019). In the final, he defeated Jaroslav Smedek of the Czech Republic by 6-4, 6-3 points in Antalya, Turkey. He also won the men’s doubles bronze medal with Prashanth Dasharath Harsambhavi in this event.
